commit.message:
Support generating videos in `eval_policy` (#248)

* Add support for recording videos in eval_policy

* Run dummy X server for CI

* Enable rendering and video tests in eval_policy

* Update Dockerfile to support running tests on X11

* Make Dockerfile paths play nice with CI

* Test rendering in our environments (using pre-release seals)

* Fix Xorg config path

* Bump seals Git commit hash

* Decrease Xorg resolution to save memory, use Xdummy in CircleCI

* Make observation types match the Box np.float32 default

* Apply suggestions from code review

Co-authored-by: Steven H. Wang <wang.steven.h@gmail.com>

* Review feedback

* Use PyPi release of seals

* Improve test coverage

* Fix test case

* Apply suggestions from code review

Co-authored-by: Steven H. Wang <wang.steven.h@gmail.com>

* Elaborate on docstring

* Use beefier CircleCI instance to avoid memory error

* Close environment in eval_policy to avoid memory leak + boost code coverage

* Parallelize with xdist

* Try less parallelism

* Force PyTorch and JAX to be singlethreaded

* Try more parallelism (may want to back off)

Co-authored-by: Steven H. Wang <wang.steven.h@gmail.com>
